title: MCA ने Small Company की Definition में किया बदलाव: Paid-Up Capital ₹10 Crore और Turnover ₹100 Crore हुआ!
content:
# MCA ने Small Company की Definition में किया बदलाव: Paid-Up Capital ₹10 Crore और Turnover ₹100 Crore हुआ!

Ek important update hai! Government ne Companies Act, 2013 ke under "Small Company" ki definition ke limits ko revise kiya hai. Is se aur bhi companies ko compliance burden mein relief milegi.

Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) ne Notification G.S.R. 880(E) dated December 1, 2025, ke through Companies (Specification of Definition Details) Amendment Rules, 2025 ko notify kiya hai. Yeh amendments immediately effective ho gaye hain.

**Key Changes:**

*   **Paid-Up Capital Limit:**
    *   **Pehle:** Paid-up capital ₹4 Crore tak hona chahiye tha.
    *   **Ab:** Paid-up capital ki limit ko badhakar ₹10 Crore kar diya gaya hai.
*   **Turnover Limit:**
    *   **Pehle:** Turnover ₹40 Crore tak hona chahiye tha.
    *   **Ab:** Turnover ki limit ko badhakar ₹100 Crore kar diya gaya hai.

Is बदलाव से, ab significantly zyada companies "Small Company" ki category mein aa payengi aur unhe simplified compliance requirements ka benefit milega, jaise ki kam board meetings aur simpler annual return forms. Yeh step ease of doing business ko promote karne ke liye ek important move hai.
